ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Tech help, anyone?
ygData.msgSnippet: Anyone else have trouble staying in the game? Rather anyone else solve the problem of being dropped from the game? I am often dropped from the game to my
ygData.messageBody:
Anyone else have trouble staying in the game? Rather anyone else solve the
problem of being dropped from the game? I am often dropped from the game to
my desktop, still connected to the internet. Sometimes it's easier to play
early in the morning, but anything after 10 am has gotten impossible. I
really want to play too. :-( I've been through all the customer service
folks and their last suggestion is maybe a new modem.

Has anyone else solved this problem? I have been playing on the pvp server
and now that I have a few things, this problem makes it too dangerous to
play. I hope someone can help.
